original: EKELÖF, Gösta Jakob, Fil Dr, österskär, f Ockelbo, Gävleb l, 1/10 81 av prost J G E o Maria Wadman, gm Mia Lundell. Fil kand Upps 09, fil dr Lund 18. Aman Upps univ 04—08, lär Tärna fhsk 08—09, rekt Gästr fhsk o lantm.sk 10—18, rekt o vkst dir St Kopparb bergsl ABs yrkessk (Bergslagets prakt sk) 18—30, förest Jernkont f örin. sk fr 23, ch Sv ind.frbs arb.led.inst sed. 30. Ordf o förest Ovans jo-Torsåker-Högbo föreläsn.frn 10—17, led Ovansjö kommun.nmd 16—18, ordf Sv yrkessk.frn sed. 24, styr.led St Tuna kommun mell.sk 28—31, led arb.fredsdeleg 29—30, ungd.arb.lösh.komm 31—32, komm f ordn av ing:as praktikfråga, styr.led Stat hantv.inst sed. 40, ordf IVA komm f anställn.fråg sed.41, led sjöförsv utbildn.komm 42-^3. Studieres samtl nord länd, Tyskl, Schweiz o Engl 09, 21, 24, 29, 38 o 39. Av trycket: Gavleåns hydrografi i samb m vattenomr ekon geogr (grad.avh) 18, Yrkesval o yrkesrådgivn 23, Berätt öv första nord yrkessk.mötet 25, Arb.-ledn o arb.fred 30, Din framtid (sv bearb ef t danskt orig) 32. Arb.ledn (handbok) mfl. RNO, RVO, LIVA. Hobbies: Skidåkn, segling.
translated: EKELÖF, Gösta Jakob, Ph.D., Österskär (born in Ockelbo, Gävle County), 1/10 81, son of Pastor J.G. E. and Maria Wadman, married to Mia Lundell. Bachelor of Arts Uppsala University 09, Ph.D. Lund 18. Assistant at Uppsala University 04-08, teacher at Tärna Folk High School 08-09, principal of Gästréns Folk High School and Rural School 10-18, principal and director of Stora Kopparberg AB's vocational school (Bergslagets practical school) 18-30, supervisor of Jernkontoret's industrial development school since 23, chairman of the Swedish Industrial Association's labor leadership institute since 30. Chairman and superintendent of Ovansjö-Torsåker-Högbo lecture association 10-17, member of Ovansjö municipality board 16-18, chairman of the Swedish Vocational School since 24, board member of Stora Tuna municipality middle school 28-31, member of labor peace delegation 29-30, youth unemployment committee 31-32, municipal committee for arranging internships, board member of State Crafts Institute since 40, chairman of the Royal Swedish Academy of Engineering Sciences employment committee since 41, member of the naval defense training committee 42-^. Studied in all Nordic countries, Germany, Switzerland, and England in 09, 21, 24, 29, 38, and 39. Publications include: Gavle River hydrography in relation to water area, economic geography (doctoral thesis) 18, Career choices and career guidance 23, Account of the first Nordic vocational school meeting 25, Labor management and labor peace 30, Your Future (Swedish adaptation of a Danish original) 32. Labor management (handbook), and more. Knight of the Royal Order of the North Star, Knight of the Royal Order of Vasa, Member of the Royal Swedish Academy of Engineering Sciences. Hobbies: Skiing, sailing.
